name: Ozi
description:
Ozi is a mobile game where you play from the perspective of Prince, who in his past was a much feared general, after being recruited. Seeks to understande more about who he was and why he remembers taking revenge on a especific person. The game is in constant development, being only on alpha to present the concept. with a touch inspired by metroidvania genre and a medium difficulty, the real challenge proposed to the player is: find and kill the boss.

Developed by: Wesley Silva and Wendel Fraga.
